meanings.definition: A type of plastic wrap used for covering food.
meanings.sent1: I need to buy more saran to wrap up the leftovers.
meanings.sent2: She carefully placed the saran over the bowl of salad.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat got tangled in the saran while trying to steal some chicken.
meanings.sent4: The saran hugged the plate of cookies tightly, keeping them fresh.
meanings.sent5: The saran crinkled as she stretched it over the dish, sealing in the freshness.

meanings.definition: To cover or wrap with saran.
meanings.sent1: Please saran the sandwiches before putting them in the picnic basket.
meanings.sent2: He saraned the cake to keep it from drying out.
meanings.sent3: The kids saraned their toys together to create a giant ball.
meanings.sent4: She saraned her books tightly to protect them from the rain.
meanings.sent5: The chef saraned the fish fillets to marinate them overnight.

meanings.definition: A brand name for a type of plastic wrap.
meanings.sent1: I prefer using saran over other plastic wraps for its quality.
meanings.sent2: The store was out of saran, so she had to buy a different brand.
meanings.sent3: The saran shimmered under the kitchen lights, catching her eye.
meanings.sent4: The saran crinkled loudly as she tore off a piece to cover the dish.
meanings.sent5: The saran clung tightly to the bowl, keeping the food fresh for days.
